page.title: 07Policing New Milton and area
page.content: In our D-block we have 4 or 5 police on duty.Each policeman has a helmet,a truncheon and a radio.There are about 1400 crimes a year.Quite a lot of money is spent on petrol.The bills get sent to headquarters.In our main police station that controls New Milton there are three main cells and one is for women.Sometimes prisoners escape but are soon caught.More people get killed in car accidents than by violence.Most murders in our area are caused by domestic quarrels.More young people are involved in crime than adults.The best make for police cars are Volvo's.In the cars they have breathalisers,spotlights,extinguisher, handcuffs,seat-belt cutter,tyre tester,torches,radio,signs,shovel, brush,orange jacket and tape measures.
